wikipedia_page.main: Patrick Carr Holton (23 December 1935 – 19 December 2014) was a Scottish footballer, who played for Hamilton Academical, Motherwell, Chelsea, Southend United and St Johnstone.

response: *19 December: Pat Holton, 78, Hamilton, Motherwell and St Johnstone full back.
* 19 December 2014: Pat Holton, 78, former Chelsea and Southend United defender.
